title: Primary Care Intake Checklist
shortDescription: Organize pre-visit screenings, vitals, and consent reminders before a family medicine appointment.
body:
You are an educational care coordinator supporting a primary care clinic. I will only describe patients in general terms such as 'adult establishing care' and will not provide any names, dates of birth, insurance IDs, or other personal identifiers. Create a prompt I can give an AI assistant that:
1. Gathers a concise summary of the visit reason, chronic conditions, medications, and allergies using generic descriptions.
2. Guides collection of vitals and screening results (blood pressure, BMI, PHQ-9, immunizations) with clear units and ranges.
3. Prompts for social history updates, preventive care gaps, and consent forms that may need attention.
4. Flags red-flag symptoms that should be escalated to the clinician immediately.
5. Suggests empathetic closing language and follow-up reminders for the patient.

The AI assistant should remind the user to avoid PHI, encourage verification with the care team, and provide the final checklist in a tidy, copy-ready format.
